summary: Preserve doesn't preserve whitespace at start of line

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? Code such as: /** * @preserve This was ASCII Art */ What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The words line up on the left: /* This was ASCII Art */ What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Live web verison. Please provide any additional information below.
This issue was closed by revision r1869.
